articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Jongsong Pharmaceutical General Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Jongsong Pharmaceutical General Factory
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Jongsong Pharmaceutical General Factory.
					 He looked round a room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the day when he was visiting the factory accompanying leader Kim Jong Il, he was very pleased to see the factory having carried out the behest of the leader by updating the production process of transfusion medicine and increasing the production capacity. 
					
					 He looked at varieties of medicines produced by the factory.
					
					 I gave an instruction to the officials of the factory to cut down the packing cost while packing medicines well during my visit to it last year, he said, noting that it has brought about a fresh improvement in packing medicines, ensured their hygiene, culture and utility at a high level and their instructions are given to the convenience of users.
					
					 And he went round the modernly expanded transfusion factory.
					
					 It is a laudable success that the factory is producing transfusion medicines that meet the requirements of the international medicine production and quality control standard by putting the production process on an automated and stream lines and production environment on a germ-free and dust-free basis at the highest level, he said.
					
					 He gave important instructions which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the factory.
					
					 He stressed the need for the factory to pay special attention to the work for thoroughly guaranteeing the security and reliability of all medicines while increasing varieties of reserve medicines including antipyretic and analgesic medicines and digestives and further raising their efficacy and establish a strict discipline and order in the medicine production, examination, storage and handling.
					
					 He underscored the need to firmly build the technical force of the factory with able talents well versed in modern science and technology and continue to exert great efforts for positively introducing advanced technology in order to make fresh progress in development and production of medicines.
					
					 He noted with great satisfaction and high appreciation that the factory has achieved a signal success at a time when eye-opening miracles and feats are being performed in succession in various parts of the country and monumental structures in the era of the Workers' Party are springing up like bamboo shoots after rain thanks to the high-pitched drive of the service personnel and people to glorify the 70th founding anniversary of the Party with high political enthusiasm and labor feats.
					
					 He said that he felt proud of making the revolution whenever he saw great successes made in all places he visited, adding that he liked to carry those doing a lot of work on his back and there is nothing to spare for them. He showed profound loving care for the factory.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the factory would fulfill their responsibility and duty as intended by the Party and thus positively contribute to giving fullest play to the advantages and might of the socialist healthcare system before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Kim Yang Gon, So Hong Chan and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives "THE STAR OF SOEKARNO" from Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives "THE STAR OF SOEKARNO" from Indonesia 
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with "THE STAR OF SOEKARNO" by the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia. 
					 There took place a ceremony of conveying its diploma and medal in Jakarta on September 27. 
					
					 The diploma and medal were conveyed to an official of the DPRK embassy in Jakarta. 
					
					 Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the foundation for education, said at a press conference that Kim Jong Un has successfully carried forward the intentions of the preceding leaders, making great contributions to the struggle for prosperity and happiness of the Korean people and peace on the Korean Peninsula and its reunification. 
					
					 Thanks to his energetic guidance a lot of successes have been achieved recently in the DPRK and peace on the Korean Peninsula is firmly guaranteed, she said. 
					
					 She added that the Soekarno Foundation for Education had the honor to award "THE STAR OF SOEKARNO" to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Seminar to Glorify Feats of Party Building and Traditions Made by Peerlessly Great Men Held
articles.content:
National Seminar to Glorify Feats of Party Building and Traditions Made by Peerlessly Great Men Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- There took place a national seminar to deeply study, grasp and glorify forever the feats of the party building and traditions made by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday. 
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials of party and power organs in Pyongyang, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and the arts and media and those of institutions of training party officials and in the field of the preservation of revolutionary relics.
					
					 The seminar heard papers explaining and proving the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea is the great Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's party which has held in high esteem the great leaders for seven decades, created a new history of the revolutionary party building and emerged ever-victorious in the revolution and construction and a promising party which is firmly carrying forward the cause of the leaders generation after generation.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, said in a speech titled "The WPK's seven-decade history is the history of the revolutionary activities of the great leaders and Marshal Kim Jong Un".
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union, the roots of our party, and the Society for Rallying Comrades and founded the WPK, the Juche-oriented revolutionary party, on October 10, Juche 34 (1945) based on the powerful organizational and ideological foundation and precious feats and experiences he personally gained in the flames of the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who formulated the revolutionary idea of the President into Kimilsungism, energetically led the struggle to model the whole party on Kimilsungism and turned the WPK into an ideological pure entity, an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity in actions with the leader as the one and only center.
					
					 The outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un serves as a firm guarantee for invariably carrying forward the immortal revolutionary history of the great leaders on this land and making the WPK shine with the idea and august names of the great leaders.
					
					 The floor was taken by Myong Son Yong, director of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Kim Tu Il, director of the Political Bureau of the Ministry of Railways, Pak Chi Ung, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Yong Sik, editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, and Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK. 
					
					 They called upon all officials, party members and other people to hold in high esteem the great leaders for all ages and carry on dynamic struggle toward the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in Mt. Paektu, rallied close around the C.C., the WPK led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Cambodian Embassy Members Do Friendship Labor in Sinchon
articles.content:
Cambodian Embassy Members Do Friendship Labor in Sinchon
						
 Sinchon, October 1 (KCNA) -- Op Sisawada, Cambodian ambassador to the DPRK, and members of his embassy did a friendship labor at the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Paeksok Cooperation Farm in Sinchon County, South Hwanghae Province on Thursday.
					 After being briefed on the history of the farm, the guests helped the farmers in doing rice harvesting.
					
					 At a break, they talked with officials of the farm.
					
					 They handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Metal Industry Held
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Metal Industry Held
						
 Songrim, September 30 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of metal industry took place at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex on Tuesday and Wednesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and officials of different units including the Ferrous Metal Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and the Chollima Steel Complex.
					
					 The participants heard more than 80 valuable papers dealing with the achievements and experience gained in increasing the production of iron and steel by rounding off the Juche-based iron-making technology of Korean-style and putting production processes on a modern and CNC basis.
					
					 There was a lecture on the trend of developing metal industry and scientific and technical issues arising in putting production processes on a modern and CNC basis.

articles.title: Tele-education System Progresses in DPRK
articles.content:
Tele-education System Progresses in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Tele-education College under Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK has recently established a tele-education system based on mobile communication network.
					 This system helps anyone receive tele-education in any place and anytime. At the college, its entrants are free to choose any of majors.
					
					 Such education system, conducive to raising the level of working citizens' knowledge, can be seen at many other universities across the country, including Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang University of Architecture and University of Sciences.

articles.title: Int'l Day of Older Persons Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Int'l Day of Older Persons Marked in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Various sports and cultural events took place in different parts of the DPRK to mark the International Day of Older Persons.
					 Children of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace and Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage and health-seekers of the Pyongyang Home for the Aged gave an art performance on Thursday to delight the aged.
					
					 In various parks and gymnasiums of Pyongyang many aged persons were seen playing sports and amusement games with vigor. Meanwhile, an aged contest in sports and amusement games began in each district of the city on September 24.
					
					 Similar events were also held in localities of the country.
					
					 Hwang Chol Ho, section chief of the Central Committee of the Federation for the Care of the Elderly of Korea, told KCNA: The aged persons in the country are now leading a happy and pleasant life under the deep care of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government, which regard it as a noble moral obligation to respect the forerunners of the revolution. We will continue to organize peculiar sports and cultural events so as to contribute to creating a social atmosphere for respecting the aged.

articles.title: Munsu Rehabilitation Clinic
articles.content:
Munsu Rehabilitation Clinic
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Munsu Rehabilitation Clinic in Pyongyang is a general medical service center for persons with disabilities.
					 The Clinic covers an area of 17 500 square meters and has more than 50 wards equipped with latest treatment facilities of 150 kinds.
					
					 Wards for children are furnished with intelligence toys in reflection of their mentality.
					
					 Boards introducing common rehabilitation knowledge are displayed in different parts of the Clinic, and its visitors can purchase necessary appliances for fitness there.
					
					 The Clinic serves those with congenital, senile and traumatic disabilities.

articles.title: Onpho Holiday Camp in DPRK
articles.content:
Onpho Holiday Camp in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Onpho Holiday Camp, located in Kyongsong County, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK, is well-known for a spa.
					 According to Director Jo Mi Suk, the camp is associated with the loving care of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 On April 23, Juche 35 (1946), President Kim Il Sung visited this area and gave an instruction to turn it into a health resort for the working citizens.
					
					 Later, he gave field guidance to it more than 20 times, indicating the ways for building and operating the resort.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, too, visited this resort and saw to it that various kinds of cultural and recreation facilities were supplied. In May 2008 when he toured the camp again, the leader took detailed measures to provide its campers with the best living conditions.
					
					 Touched by such loving care of the great persons, the employees of the camp bettered the resort, building more structures and facilities, recently when it was hit by flooding.
					
					 In the camp there are fashionable buildings, a park covering an area of 2 000 square meters and several ponds. And the camp is equipped with various sports and cultural facilities, welfare service facilities and supply base.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Repeal of S. Korea-U.S. Mutual Defense Treaty
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Repeal of S. Korea-U.S. Mutual Defense Treaty
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- 62 years have passed since the U.S. fabricated the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" by instigating the pro-U.S. stooges of south Korea.
					 The U.S. imperialists concluded the above-said treaty with the south Korean authorities under the groundless pretext of the "threat of southward invasion" to realize the criminal ambition for dominating the whole of Korea at any cost on Oct. 1, 1953.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in an article. It went on:
					
					 For more than 60 years the U.S. has lorded it over in south Korea under the clout of the treaty and hurled the south Korean army into escalating military confrontation with the fellow countrymen and the moves for igniting a war against the north.
					
					 It is the strong desire of all the compatriots in the north and the south and abroad to reject the foreign forces' military domination and interference and achieve the historic cause of independent reunification by the Korean nation itself.
					
					 The criminal south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" should be repealed without delay as it violates the dignity and sovereignty of the south Korean people, check the improvement of the north-south relations and national reunification and increase the danger of a war against the north.
					
					 Now the U.S. is willing to keep the system of its military domination over south Korea by using the conservative group as its brides man but such a trick will no longer work.
					
					 There is no pretext under which the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty", an outcome of the confrontational times, can exist.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should immediately repeal the criminal treaty and withdraw the U.S imperialist aggressors out of south Korea as soon as possible.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Moves to Exterminate Korean Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Moves to Exterminate Korean Nation
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists fabricated the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" in August, 1910 by a brigandish method. They renamed the "residency-general in Korea" the "government-general in Korea", the colonial fascist ruling organization, and enforced the ruthless government-general administration from October 1, 1910.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The "government-general in Korea" was a repressive machine to politically dominate and oppress the Korean people. It was also a brigandish mechanism for economic exploitation aimed to put under control the main economic arteries of Korea by relying on the military strong-arm politics as well as a ruling tool for oppressing and exterminating the national education and culture of Korea.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the Japanese imperialists pursued unprecedented fascist repression and terror politics throughout Korea and brutally and mercilessly suppressed and killed Korean people, the article goes on:
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Japanese reactionaries have gone desperate in their efforts to shirk the responsibility while denying and beautifying the historical facts, far from honestly admitting and making reparations for their past aggression crimes.
					
					 The present chief executive of Japan made wordplay at the "statement marking the 70th anniversary of the defeat of Pacific war" where he refused to mention such words as sincere admission and apology for the aggression history.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are working hard to attain their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" through the revision of the "Japan-U.S. Defence Cooperation Guidelines" and institution of the "security legislation".
					
					 If Japan opts to take the road of militarist reinvasion while persistently evading the liquidation of its past crimes and distorting the aggression history, it would have to pay an indescribably higher price than the defeat it suffered seven decades ago.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of Japan's "Security Legislation"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of Japan's "Security Legislation" 
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Now the international community expresses serious concern over the fact that  the  security bills pursuant to "the Japan-U.S. Defence Cooperation Guidelines" were rammed through the session of the House of Councilors of Japan to become law.
					 This clearly shows what phase Japan's ambition has reached to realize the old dream of the militarists for world domination, vociferating about "Oriental peace," says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that Japan recently started reexamination of the standard of actions of units of the "Self-Defense Forces" which strictly defined the situation and procedures for using weapons following the adoption of the "security legislation." 
					
					 Through this, Japan brought to light that the dash made by it under the signboard of "proactive pacifism" precisely means the way for turning it into a war state again and the way for overseas aggression. 
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that its neighboring and other Asian countries and Western countries express uneasiness and concern over the fact that Japan has become a country capable of provoking a war again and even it is touching off strong opposition in Japan over its dangerous and reckless moves. 
					
					 The society of Japan is becoming critical of the Abe administration's railroading of the bills despite public opposition and protest statements and demonstrations are taking place in different places one after another. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionary ruling quarters should lend their ears to the angry voices of people of all social standings. 
					
					 People's mindset represents the will of Heaven. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to bear in mind that if they persistently rush headlong into militarization and overseas expansion going against the trend of the times, this will only precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Her Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Her Invectives against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- At the recent 70th Session of the UN General Assembly, the south Korean chief executive asserted "dismantlement of the north's nukes is the top priority task for building a world without nuclear weapons" and "the north's additional provocation is aimed at chilling the atmosphere of north-south dialogue and hamstringing the efforts of the countries concerned with the six-party talks to resume dialogue for denuclearization". She even talked rubbish that "the north should strive to help its inhabitants overcome hardships through reform and opening instead of resorting to additional provocation".
					 She even begged for "cooperation" with her regime in its moves to do harm to the compatriots in the north, not content with hurting its dignity and social system, talking about "demand of the international community" and urging "improvement of human rights."
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday says:
					
					 What she uttered is an outright provocation against the dialogue partner and a confrontational scenario for derailing the hard-won phase of stability between the north and the south. This is lashing all Koreans into great fury.
					
					 Dialogue can by no means be a veil for covering up the ulterior design to escalate confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are keen on escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north while paying lip-service to "dialogue". Quite clear is what catastrophic consequence will be entailed by this double-dealing attitude.
					
					 No wonder, the public at home and abroad is getting vocal expressing concern over the fact that the confrontational racket being kicked up by the south Korean authorities during their foreign junkets may completely derail dialogue.
					
					 The DPRK has warned the south Korean regime against the above-said behavior.
					
					 It is the stand of the DPRK that it would no longer show leniency to those desperately working to do harm to the compatriots.
					
					 If the south Korean regime has an iota of sense and intention to mend the north-south relations, it should refrain from letting loose such provocative invectives and make an apology to the entire nation for recklessly insulting the compatriots, though belatedly.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of Encouraging Leaflet-Scattering Operation against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of Encouraging Leaflet-Scattering Operation against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime persistently encourages the leaflet-scattering operation against the DPRK.
					 It let betes noires of the "Alliance for the Movement of Free North," an organization of "defectors from the north", scatter 200 000 leaflets slandering the DPRK from Phaju, Kyonggi Province on Sept. 20. Two days later, it let a similar organization scatter 900 000 leaflets over areas of the DPRK.
					
					 This is no more than the last-ditch efforts of the betes noires to chill the atmosphere of improving the north-south relations created with much effort through the north-south high-level urgent contact in August last.
					
					 What matters is the fact that the reckless leaflet-scattering operation was a deliberate and premeditated provocation perpetrated by the betes noires in violation of the spirit of the north-south agreement at the tacit connivance of the south Korean regime. 
					
					 If the south Korean regime has a sincere will to promote the north-south relations, it should not only stop "the psychological broadcasting against the north" but also refrain from such acts as slandering the dialogue partner as called for by the north-south agreement.
					
					 However, such human scum are still free to conduct anti-DPRK leaflets-scattering operations in south Korea. The present regime of south Korea has shielded and patronized them, claiming "it cannot ban the operation without any legal ground as the operation is freedom of expression."
					
					 This makes the DPRK question the regime whether it has an intention and will to mend the north-south relations and implement all the provisions specified in the agreement made at the north-south high-level urgent contact.
					
					 Leaflet-scattering is an unpardonable treacherous act, which was prompted by the south Korean regime's design to escalate confrontation with the DPRK. It is also a mockery and insult to all Koreans and world peace-loving people calling for detente on the Korean Peninsula and improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 Leaflets scattered by the betes noires contain anti-DPRK invectives often talked by the present south Korean authorities.
					
					 They are crying out for ideologically and morally disarming the people of the DPRK and undermining its single-minded unity in a bid to achieve with ease "unification under liberal democracy."
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove once again that the present ruling forces of south Korea have no political will to create an atmosphere of peace and stability, reconciliation and cooperation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Unless they drop their sinister design against the DPRK, the north-south ties will be plunged into endless political and military confrontation.
					
					 The DPRK has already clarified more than once that leaflet-scattering amounts to a declaration of war against it.
					
					 In case the leaflet-scattering operation is continuously allowed and connived at by the south Korean regime, the north-south relations will be again thrown into an uncontrollable catastrophe. This is as plain as a pikestaff.
					
					 The south Korean regime should stop encouraging it at once, well aware of the cherished desire of all Koreans.

articles.title: Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Family members of the victims of the case of attempted rebellion and those related to the Unified Progressive Party and other people of different circles of south Korea held a meeting in front of the Suwon detention house in Kyonggi Province on September 29 in demand of the release of the imprisoned victims, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Speakers said that the conservative forces are labeling those helping the victims as "forces following the north."
					
					 Innocent people died in prison and many prisoners of conscience are still in prisons across south Korea, they noted.
					
					 Similar actions took place before the detention houses in Taegu, Kwangju, Jonju of North Jolla Province, Anyang of Kyonggi Province and other parts of south Korea on the same day.

articles.title: Guinean Organization Supports October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Guinean Organization Supports October 4 Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Guinea-Korea Friendship Association released a bulletin on September 23 on the occasion of the solidarity period for supporting the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and 8th anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The bulletin introduced the content of the declaration, saying:
					
					 As soon as the declaration was published, it aroused full support from not only the entire Korean nation but the international community.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the declaration were strikingly demonstrated.
					
					 But the north-south relations were totally checked and inched close to the brink of a war by the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea.
					
					 Lee totally denied the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and October 4 declaration and pursued only dependence on foreign forces and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 It is an invariable stand and unshakable will of the DPRK to defend and implement the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Whether inter-Korean relations make good improvement or go to the brink of a war entirely depends on the attitude of the south Korean authorities to the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Anti-U.S. Demonstration Held in Russia
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. Demonstration Held in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A demonstration was held in front of the building of the U.S. embassy in Moscow on September 17 denouncing the U.S. moves against the DPRK.
					 Figures of the Central Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation and the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK took part in the demonstration together with the people of all social strata.
					
					 Today's demonstration shows that a lot of people in Russia are standing against the U.S. war policy for aggression and disputes pursued by the U.S. in Asian countries, Anatoli Nikolayevich Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation, said.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The demonstration is the one against the U.S. mean policy for aggression and the south Korean puppet government following it.
					
					 Revedev, administrative person of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, said that he took part in the demonstration with the figures of the Lenin Young Communist League to express solidarity for the DPRK standing against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the Korean people are achieving wonderful successes in the struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country while frustrating sanctions and pressure of the U.S. and the western countries.
					
					 So many citizens of Russia get united with the people of the DPRK.
					
					 We have a common history of having fought with the Korean people against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The DPRK is a socialist fortress of the world.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce S. Korean Warmongers for Their Military Provocation Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce S. Korean Warmongers for Their Military Provocation Moves against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on September 25 in denunciation of the south Korean war-like forces for their military provocation against the DPRK. 
					 The special warfare commander of the south Korean puppet Army in a report at the "National Assembly" on Sept. 23 said south Korea is pushing forward the "formation of a special unit for striking major strategic military installations of the north such as nuclear facilities" and will form an air force unit for "ensuring the swift infiltration operation of a special unit", the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula that took the road of detente and improved relations to a catastrophe again with such military provocations.
					
					 Behind the shameless threat and provocation against the DPRK has always been the U.S. which sought to put the peninsula under its control.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear force is war deterrence for defending peace.
					
					 If the maniacs launch a war, the Korean People's Army will mercilessly punish the provocateurs by dint of Songun.
					
					 The statement bitterly condemned the reckless provocations by the south Korean military warmongers.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Events took place abroad on September 24 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included a meeting in Germany and photo exhibition and film show in South Africa.
					
					 On display at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos documenting the exploits President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un performed for the party-building.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the glorious history of the WPK.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched a Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity".
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that the President founded the glorious WPK and led the revolution and construction to a victory.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of the President and consolidated it as the guiding force of the revolution and headquarters both in name and reality.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the WPK has grown stronger as the genuine party of the people and the mother party deeply rooted among them and serving them.
					
					 The secretary of a regional committee of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and other personages praised the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu for founding and developing the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Combinado Farmaceutico Jongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Combinado Farmaceutico Jongsong
						
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Combinado Farmaceutico Jongsong.
					Estuvo primero en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Al recordar con gran emocion aquel dia su visita al Combinado junto con el Dirigen Kim Jong Il, se puso muy regocijado de que la fabrica cumplio uno de los legados del Dirigente al realizar la modernizacion de la cadena de produccion de medicinas transfusibles y ampliar su capacidad productiva.
					
					El Mariscal paso revista a los medicamentos que salen de la fabrica.
					
					Durante su visita hecha el ano pasado, instruyo embalar bien los productos y rebajar el costo de embalaje, recordo y agrego que se ha mejorado considerablemente el embalaje de medicinas, son higienicas, vistosas y practicas sus bolsas y son confortables para los usuarios las notas explicativas.
					
					Seguidamente, el Mariscal recorrio la ampliada fabrica de medicinas transfusibles.
					
					Senalo que es un exito loable el que se hayan perfeccionado la automatizacion y la cadena de produccion y la esterilizacion sin polvos del ambiente productivo, asi que la fabrica produce las medicinas transfusibles, convenientes a la norma internacional de produccion y control de calidad de medicamentos.
					
					El Mariscal presento las preciosas instrucciones que sirven de guia en la gestion y administracion de la fabrica.
					
					Enfatizo que la fabrica debe prestar primordial atencion al aumento de variedad de los medicamentos de auxilio, al mejoramiento de sus funciones y al aseguramiento de la seguridad y confianza de todas las medicinas, y establecer la disciplina y orden rigurosos en la produccion, examen, conservacion y tratamiento de las medicinas.
					
					Destaco que para registrar nuevo avance en el desarrollo y la produccion de medicamentos, hay que consolidar las fuerzas tecnicas de la fabrica con los competentes intelectuales versados en las ciencias y tecnicas modernas y esforzarse por aplicar los avanzados tecnicos. 
					
					Subrayo que la fabrica logro grandes exitos cuando por doquier del pais se crean sucesivamente los milagros y proezas asombrosos y se levantan muchas creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo, gracias al ejercito y el pueblo levantados para hacer brillar el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC con el elevado entusiasmo politico y los exitos laborales, y lo evaluo altamente.
					
					Al ver los exitos enorgullecedores logrados en los lugares visitados por el mismo en estos dias, se sentia orgulloso de hacer revolucion, asevero y agrego que no hay nada de escatimar para ellos. Y dispenso grandes benevolencias a la fabrica.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica cumpliran con su responsabilidad y obligacion de acuerdo con la voluntad del partido a fin de contribuir a poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad y el poderio del sistema socialista de salud publica y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Hwang Pyong So, Kim Yang Gon, So Hong Chan y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe premio de Fundacion de Educacion Soekarno
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe premio de Fundacion de Educacion Soekarno 
						
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio el premio "Estrella de Soekarno" que le entregara la Fundacion de Educacion Soekarno de Indonesia.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 27 de septiembre en Yakarta la ceremonia de entrega de diploma y medalla del mencionado premio.
					
					El diploma y la medalla fueron entregados a un funcionario de la embajada coreana en su pais.
					
					En la rueda de prensa efectuada tras la ceremonia de entrega, Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, presidenta del comite constitutivo de la Fundacion de Educacion Soekarno, dijo como sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, maximo dirigente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sucedio con brillantez los propositos de los lideres coreanos antecedentes e hizo gran aporte a la lucha por la prosperidad y la felicidad del pueblo coreano, la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Gracias a su abnegada direccion, se obtienen en estos dias notables exitos en la RPDC y se garantiza con firmeza la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Para la Fundacion de Educacion Soekarno es una gloria entregar el premio "Estrella de Soekarno" a Su Excelencia Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Seminario central para transmitir hazanas de grandes lideres
articles.content:
Seminario central para transmitir hazanas de grandes lideres
						
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario central para asimilar y transmitir las hazanas y tradiciones realizadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un para la construccion del partido.
					Tomaron parte alli Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, los funcionarios de los organos del partido y el Poder, el Consejo de Ministros y las entidades de masas del centro y de la ciudad de Pyongyang, y los otros de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, el organismo de formacion de funcionarios partidistas y de rama de historia revolucionaria.
					
					En la ocasion se presentaron las disertaciones referentes a que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea es el gran partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il que durante 70 anos vino logrando solamente las victorias en la revolucion y la construccion al enaltecer a los grandes lideres y creando nueva historia de la construccion del partido revolucionario, y el mas prometedor que continua mas firmemente generacion tras generacion la causa del lider.
					
					En su intervencion intitulada "La historia de 70 anos del PTC es la de actividades revolucionarias de los grandes lideres y del Mariscal Kim Jong Un", Kim Ki Nam, secretario del Comite Central del PTC, senalo como sigue:
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung organizo la "Union Para Derrotar al Imperialismo" y la Asociacion de Camaradas Konsol, raices de nuestro partido. A base del cimiento organizativo-ideologico preparado personalmente en el periodo de la lucha antijaponesa y sus proezas y experiencias preciosas, el Presidente fundo el 10 de octubre del 34 (1945) de la Era Juche el PTC, partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien formulo la idea revolucionaria del Presidente como kimilsungismo, dirigio activamente la lucha por transformar todo el partido segun el kimilsungismo y consolido el PTC como organizacion pura en lo ideologico y como organizacion identificada y unificada en la accion en torno al lider.
					
					La destacada orientacion del Mariscal deviene la firme garantia para transmitir para siempre la historia revolucionaria de los grandes lideres y glorificar el partido con la idea y el nombre de los grandes lideres.
					
					Myong Son Yong, director de la Escuela Superior del Partido Kim Il Sung, Kim Tu Il, jefe de la direccion politica del Ministerio de Ferrocarril, Pak Chi Ung, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Yong Sik, editor-jefe de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, y Kim Su Gil, secretario jefe del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, destacaron en sus intervenciones que todos los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y los trabajadores deben enaltecer para siempre a los grandes lideres y luchar vigorosamente para la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu uniendose mas compactamente en torno al CC del PTC encabezado por el Mariscal.
